title: Hour 3 - TJ Houshmandzadeh, Three Word Game
itunes:title: Hour 3 - TJ Houshmandzadeh, Three Word Game
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, former Cincinatti Bengal and Pro Bowl wide receiver (and current FOX Sports NFL analyst and radio host) T.J. Houshmandzadeh joins Colin to discuss the Bengals winning their division, Antonio Brown's odd exit from the Buccaneers, and more. Finally, Colin ends the show with the "Three Word Game." 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
